data.title: Old School Candy & Pop Shop
data.text: Something for everyone here,   all candy from back in the day to current.  Very cool spread of old fashioned soda pop too

data.title: Average candy store
data.text: This place has cool root beer and pops but other than that, it's mostly average candy with a few quirky candies and gifts.

data.title: Cool store
data.text: Unique candy and soda items...fun to visit and near area by monument.  All of dowtown in this area is beautiful, walkable, safe, family friendly.

data.title: Good taffy... that's about it
data.text: This place is good for satisfying your curiosity and getting some tasty taffy.  Other than that I wasn't amazed. They have a ton of weird sodas and other candy but I don't really understand who buys it.

data.title: Candy, Candy, Candy
data.text: great big little place to get all of the nostalgic candies of yesteryear.  Staff is friendly and helpful

data.title: Cool Spot Downtown!
data.text:
You could spend a lot of time in here just checking out all the different soda flavors and unique candies! 

It can be a bit overwhelming at first so we had a worker help us pick out a few bottles. Just tell them your favorite flavor and they can make recommendations! It was nice to have help since it would've been easy to miss something. Ended up with 2 flavors of root beer, guava, an elderberry pop. 

Thanks for a great experience - will definitely be back next time we are in Indy!

data.title: Rocket fizz
data.text: Cute and fun store with lots of old school drinks and candies. Numerous choices and right on the circle of downtown Indianapolis. Plenty of restaurants near by.

data.title: Great novelty place
data.text: Great novelty soda selection!  We had a great time just reading all of the different bottles and different flavors.  We took home several bottles of soda and taffy and they taste wonderful.  We will be coming back here!

data.title: Great Date Night!
data.text: Rocket Fizz is a great date spot. On the weekends, you can park on the streets for free. It is in the center of downtown Indy so you can walk around and see the monuments. The sodas are fun, unique and delicious and about the same price as a fountain drink at a restaurant. They also have candy. This is a great, cheap date.

data.title: Friendly staff
data.text: Wow more flavors of soda than I ever new existed.  Staff was more then willing to point out the good from the bad, other than that a candy shop.

data.title: O
data.text: This store was really cute. Had lots of novelty candy and soda. Located right by the monument which was interesting as well

data.title: Outstanding
data.text: I love going to this place!  I could spend hours looking at all the items they have.  Staff is so nice

data.title: Fun little store
data.text: Just a fun stop to pick up some root beer.  Lots of weird candy and soda. We enjoyed looking at all the different flavors of soda.

data.title: Fun place for kids, try a crazy soda flavor
data.text: This place has hundreds of strange soda brews, we all picked one out of the cold case in the back and enjoyed drinking them outside by the monument.  There's also a bunch of unique candy for sale as well.

data.title: Fun! Lots of interesting candy and pop.
data.text: This was lots of fun! Interesting candy, novelties and soda. Lots that I would eat and some...not so much. Jalapeno soda...umm, no thanks. We spent about a half hour just looking around then picked our favorites to enjoy on our ride home.

data.title: bottle sodas galore!
data.text:
Great place to stop in if you are in the area. Most prices for bottled soda's was under $3. Crazy flavors like: Bug Barf, Dog Drool, Red Velvet cookie dough & Bacon Soda.
Also have reg. flavors. We thought the candy felt stale so check it out before you buy. Even had bacon band aids but they were & 8 !! Fun place and would go again. Bought sodas for my grandkids.

data.title: Fun Old-Style Sweets Shop
data.text: My kids love this candy store. The shop is located on the Circle in the heart of downtown Indianapolis and has all the candy basics (gum, chocolate, gummies, suckers, etc) as well as hard-to-find specialty items such as Japanese candies, soda of every flavor and type, and hundreds of taffy flavors in bulk buns. Rocket Fizz also sells vintage tin signs, cardboard cutouts of celebrities, and kitschy toys. This is a fun stop for a pop in if you're on or near Monument Circle, walking around downtown Indy, and the staff is always friendly and eager to help.

data.title: Fun, Unique
data.text: Stopped by and browsed the assortment of unusual candies and drinks.  Loved that they had the Butterbeer from Harry Potter!

data.title: Ok
data.text: Super small store, mostly rootbeer and novelty type sodas. They do have a lot of candy we hadn't seen since our childhood. If ur in the area it's prolly worth stopping but I wouldn't go outa my way to visit. We were in and out in 5-10min tops.

data.title: Worth a visit
data.text: So fun, the largest collection of soda flavors I have ever seen, a whole wall of root beer varieties, and strange flavors that probably shouldn't exist (think beanboozeled).  Fun gifts, a huge array of candy, and lots to surprise. Fun to look and a good place for a treat that is unusual.
